idea-plugin.name: Modern Cpp New Project
idea-plugin.description:
Tired of manually copying around a standard modern Cpp project template every time you create a new project?
Well look no more, for this is a solution to this problem. This plugin automates this mundane task by caching your template
. This way you can even work offline for some time. It mainly provides a 'Modern Cpp New Project' option, and allows you to selected a template of your choice. It goes on to configure your project in your new location. No muss, no fuss.
idea-plugin.change-notes: - Added a clear description of the plugin.
